StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTimesheetWklyHoursSummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int, @RecruiterID uniqueidentifier, @FiscalYear int, @Month int, @Week int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @CalendarYear int
IF @Month = 10 OR @Month = 11 OR @Month = 12 BEGIN SET @CalendarYear = @FiscalYear - 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @CalendarYear = @FiscalYear END
DECLARE @CurrentMonth DateTime SET @CurrentMonth = CAST(CONVERT(varchar(4), @CalendarYear) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2),@Month) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2),1) as Date.me)
DECLARE @PrevMonth DateTime SET @PrevMonth = DATEADD(month, -1, @CurrentMonth)
DECLARE @StartDate date.me
SELECT @StartDate = StartDate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY startdate) AS WeekNumber, * FROM USMC.Objec.veWeek WHERE OrgID = @OrgID and year = @CalendarYear and month = @Month ) AS ObjWeek WHERE WeekNumber = @Week
DECLARE @recCount int SET @recCount = 0
DECLARE @ObjWeekID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @WeekStartDate date.me DECLARE @WeekEndDate date.me DECLARE @TimeSheetWeekID uniqueidentifier
CREATE TABLE #TimeSheetSummary ( Week int, Total decimal(9,1), Produc.ve decimal(9,1), Support decimal(9,1), Unproduc.ve decimal(9,1), StartDate date.me, EndDate date.me )
DECLARE sql_cursor CURSOR FOR SELECT Top 5 ID, StartDate, EndDate FROM USMC.Objec.veWeek WHERE OrgId = @OrgID AND ( ( Year = @CalendarYear AND Month = @Month ) OR ( Year = Year(@PrevMonth) AND Month = Month(@PrevMonth) ) ) AND startdate <= @StartDate ORDER BY StartDate Desc
OPEN sql_cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM sql_cursor INTO @ObjWeekID, @WeekStartDate, @WeekEndDate
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
SET @TimeSheetWeekID = NULL
SELECT @TimeSheetWeekID = ID FROM USMC.TimeSheetWeekly WHERE Objec.veWeekID = @ObjWeekID AND RecruiterID = @RecruiterID
INSERT INTO #TimeSheetSummary SELECT @recCount, (Produc.veTime + SupportTime + Unproduc.veTime) as WeeklyHour, Produc.veTime, SupportTime, Unproduc.veTime, @WeekStartDate, @WeekEndDate FROM (SELECT Sum(ISNULL(TelephoneCall, 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([AreaCanvassing], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([HomeVisit], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([O.ceTra.c], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([ElectronicProspec.ng], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([Screening], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([Interviewing], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([OtherProduc.veTime], 0)) as Produc.veTime
,Sum(ISNULL([CollegeHighSchoolVisit], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([MediaVisit], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([ContactVisit], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([ListResearch], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([EnlistmentPapers], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([PooleeMee.ng], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([Planning], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([OtherSupportTime], 0)) as SupportTime
,Sum(ISNULL([DriveWalk], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([Rou.neAdmin], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([MetsMeps], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([LunchBreak], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([Miscellaneous], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([OtherUnproduc.veTime1], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([OtherUnproduc.veTime2], 0)) +Sum(ISNULL([OtherUnproduc.veTime3], 0)) as Unproduc.veTime
FROM USMC.TimeSheetDaily WHERE TimeSheetWeekID = @TimeSheetWeekID )AS T1
SET @recCount = @recCount + 1
FETCH NEXT FROM sql_cursor INTO @ObjWeekID, @WeekStartDate, @WeekEndDate
END
CLOSE sql_cursor DEALLOCATE sql_cursor
IF @recCount < 5 BEGIN WHILE @recCount < 5 BEGIN
INSERT INTO #TimeSheetSummary VALUES(@recCount, null, null, null, null, null, null)
SET @recCount = @recCount + 1 END END
SELECT * FROM #TimeSheetSummary
DROP Table #TimeSheetSummary
END
